code: export const testUsers=[{id:1,username:"user1",password:"password1",nickname:"Nick1",email:"user1@example.com"},{id:2,username:"user2",password:"password2",nickname:"Nick2",email:"user2@example.com"},{id:3,username:"user3",password:"password3",nickname:"Nick3",email:"user3@example.com"}];export const findUser=(username,password)=>{return testUsers.find(user=>user.username===username&&user.password===password);};export const addUser=newUser=>{const id=testUsers.length+1;testUsers.push({...newUser,id});return{...newUser,id};};
